mapper.insert: insert into hopeuserconf (confid, aamid, confvalue, setname) values (#{confid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{aamid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{confvalue,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{setname,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

confid,
